author: Blender Guru
description:
Let's render that donut 🍩
New parts releasing every other day.

In this video you'll learn how to model the plate, make the donut lumpy, create basic materials and do a render.

All Links🔗: https://www.blenderguru.com/tutorials/blender-donut-v5-tutorial

Poliigon (My sister company): http://www.poliigon.com High-quality Models, Textures, HDRIs

=== Chapter Marks ✂️===
0:00 Model the Plate
8:29 Using a Lattice to make the Donut lumpy
16:03 Your First Render
17:02 Controlling the Camera
20:21 Using Raytracing
22:35 Render View Mode
23:30 Basic Materials
26:30 SSS
29:35 Adding the table
32:02 The Beginners Academy
